newsitem.title: JORDAN: Jordan CD rates 9.25-9.50 pct, 15 mln dinars offer.
newsitem.headline: Jordan CD rates 9.25-9.50 pct, 15 mln dinars offer.

text.p: Interest yields from Jordan's central bank certificates of deposit auction on Saturday were unchanged at up to 9.25 percent for three month CDs and up to 9.50 percent for six months, the bank said on Saturday.

It gave no breakdown of the three-month and six-month bills out of a total 15 million dinars ($21 million) offered. It said it was offering a further 15 million dinars in CDs at next Saturday's auction.
Repurchase agreements as collateral to weekly CDs remained at 10 percent with an unchanged 8.5 percent discount rate.
Outstanding CDs fell slightly to 617.5 million dinars from 621.3 million dinars the previous week.
